name: Dyslexic Detective
description:
Story 📕 

 A new employee, Randy M.T. 😐 recently discovered something strange in storage locker 117. It’s company policy at StorageNStuff to cut off any old rusted locks 🔓, notify the owners of the locker and give them a new combo. Randy found a small pile of books 📚 with a blood stained note on top of them that read “property of Saxiel Yamo”. It seemed like the locker had been abandoned and no owners were on file. An abandoned locker, with some books and a man 💀 who has been missing for almost thirty years. That’s a Monday morning folks. Will you be able to solve the case?

Gameplay 🎲 

Step inside the shoes 👟 of the Dyslexic Detective 😎 and see the world as he does. You will be placed in a virtual escape room to solve a murder mystery 🔎 of epic proportions by unscrambling words and finding the killer.

Goal 📢

20% of the world 🌎 is dyslexic or has trouble reading. Our goal is to go beyond spreading awareness and empower people with dyslexia by sparking a conversation 💬 as well as fostering empathy 💖.

Created 👐 with care 🤟 by Gursirat Singh ⏳, Harika Muthalraj 🔧, Jake Steinmetz 🎨 and Tej Sidhu 💼
